SEARCH
Module FoundationsF25
Package guiSearchPosts

Class ViewSearchPosts

java.lang.Object
guiSearchPosts.ViewSearchPosts
public class ViewSearchPosts extends Object
View class for the search posts functionality in the MVC architecture. Manages the user interface and display of the search window.

This view provides:

  • A keyword text field for entering search terms
  • A thread dropdown for filtering by thread category
  • A list view displaying search results with post details
  • Double-click functionality to open posts in the reader
  • Navigation buttons (Search and Back)

The view uses a thread combo box with color-coded categories to match the visual style of the Student Home Page. Search results display post ID, title, author, thread, match type, and a contextual snippet.

      public static void displaySearch(javafx.stage.Stage ps, entityClasses.User user)

    • displaySearch

      public static void displaySearch(javafx.stage.Stage ps, entityClasses.User user, String initialKeyword)
      Displays the search window with an optional initial keyword pre-filled in the search field.

      Opens the search window for the user, resetting the thread selection to "All Threads" and optionally pre-filling the keyword field with the provided value. If the keyword is null, an empty string is used instead.

      Parameters:
      ps - The primary stage to display the window on
      user - The current user performing the search
      initialKeyword - The keyword to pre-fill in the search field (null or empty for blank)
